Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately draw two students trying to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone device that connects both students with cups and string.
The student can show clearly how sound travels along the string to enable communication.
The student can depict only the materials provided as part of the design, like cups and string, with precision.
The student can include features that allow the device to send or receive sound over a distance, like tautness of the string.
The student can label key parts of the device that use sound for communication, such as the ends of the cups and string.
The student can illustrate how this device helps people communicate over long distances effectively.
CANNOT: May occasionally omit labeling one minor part of the device (e.g., a detailed note about cup use) but generally understands its purpose.
